details.companyStoryPara1: Everything you see at Zen Fashion is hand-selected and 100 percent authentic; it was specifically sourced for you from the greatest brands and their authorized resellers in the US and throughout the world.
details.companyStoryPara2: Begin your journey online with one of the fastest growing, e-commerce brands in the country and have a seamless online shopping experience. Immerse yourself in the joy of browsing through the best brands in fashion.
details.values: We believe that the Zen Fashion woman deserves nothing but the best, purest, most trustworthy and wellness products money can buy. From our inception, we have strived to set the benchmark in product quality control so that our customers are assured of receiving only 100% genuine and fresh products. Unlike other online players, we NEVER source anything from the ‘grey market’, only offering products that are 100% authentic and sourced directly from the brands or their authorized distributors. This authenticity extends to all aspects of how we run our business and we’re always bettering our processes to ensure we’re always delivering the best.

details.sectionTitle: A Day In the life Of Our's

details.teamContent: Her attention to detail, involvement in every aspect of the firm and passion for the business are qualities that make her a great leader. Assisting Falguni is a driven team of enthusiastic professionals drawn from myriad fields, all united in their common goal of changing the face of beauty. Through exclusive launches, product innovation, sharp communication and appealing design elements, the Zen Fashion Team aspires to reach new echelons. The team has grown exponentially, with two offices in Portland and Hillsboro. At the heart of our growth is the 1000+ Zen Fashion Army, an enthusiastic, motivated group of women and men committed to bring the magic and delight of beauty to your doorstep.

teamDetails.caption: An accomplished  Computer Engineer, Sanjay shows a keen interest in building high impact teams and scalable software platforms. He brings his years of experience working at companies like Oracle Corporation, TriVium Systems, Amazon and Tradus.com to the table and is the main man leading our Tech team.
teamDetails.name: Daniel T

teamDetails.caption: Reena joined us in 2016 as CEO, ZEN Fashion, the private label arm of our e-commerce platform. With her 20+ years of experience in the retail industry, she has developed a reputation for being a strategist and an astute business planner and has been instrumental in taking the Zen Fashion’s private label to new heights by introducing new product lines and increasing distribution.
teamDetails.name: Eva Brown

teamDetails.caption: Manoj joined Zen Fashion as VP Operations and Chief Supply Chain Officer and has ensured the processes and operations run like clockwork. With over a decade of experience in companies like Seventymm Services Pvt.Ltd, Future Group and ibibo Group, he is responsible for designing d-commerce, m-commerce & e-commerce specific creative implementations for sourcing, order fulfillment, inventory management & warehouse operations.
teamDetails.name: Thomas

teamDetails.caption: An IIMA alumnus, he is a qualified Chartered Accountant, Company Secretary and financial professional with over two decades of experience with market leaders. Arvind has honed his skills across a financial gamut that includes accounting, reporting, financial controls and regulatory matters on one side, and commercially orientated business partnering and financial planning and analysis on other side. Arvind will as part of the leadership team drive the company's growth plan and set financial milestones and targets for the future.
teamDetails.name: Francis

whoWeAreContent.caption: Rockstar team players

details.sectionTitle: What Our Customers Are Saying About Us

testimonials.heading: Bengaluru, Karnataka
testimonials.content: If you're looking for high-quality fabrics and expert tailoring, Zen-Fashion is the place to go. Their stitching is impeccable and their clothes are always comfortable and flattering.
testimonials.author: Ramesh Kumar

testimonials.heading: Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala
testimonials.content: Zen-Fashion is my go-to store for ethnic wear. Their collection of kurtas and tunics is always on-trend and affordable, and I love how easy it is to mix and match different pieces.
testimonials.author: Deepa Nair

testimonials.heading: Chennai, Tamil Nadu
testimonials.content: I was impressed by the customer service at Zen-Fashion. The staff was knowledgeable and helpful, and they went above and beyond to make sure I found the perfect outfit for a family event.
testimonials.author: Rajeshwari Iyer

details.sectionTitle: Things You Didn’t Know About Us

knowAboutUs.caption: The first order ever placed on Zen Fashion was on October 24, 2012.
2018 was a watershed year. We successfully launched four new offerings.
The first two products sold on Zen Fashion were L’Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Lipstick (Burning Rose), and Maybelline New York Express Finish Nail Color (Pearly Pink)
